sentence: Open science can and should be implemented at each step of the research process (Fig 1).
In addition, all texts written on the rationale and hypothesis of the study or method descriptions, or design schemes created during the planning phase can be used in the final publications (Fig 1).

Choosing the right license for the deposited code and data ensures that authors get credit for their work.Publication and connection of all outcomes
If scientists have used all available open science tools during the research process, then publishing and linking all outcomes represents the well-deserved harvest (Fig 2).
The more open science products that are generated, the more reproducible the work becomes, but also the more the visibility of a study increases (Fig 2).
